bill.title: Minimum Wage; Employment
bill.description: Increases the hourly minimum wage to $7.75 on January 1, 2014, $8.25 on January 1, 2015, $8.75 on January 1, 2016, and $9.00 on January 1, 2017. Effective July 1, 2050. (SB331 HD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to JDL, WAM.
The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-07-13 10:00AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 0 Excused: none.
The committee on JDL will reconsider its previous decision on 02-07-13 and will hold a public decision making on 02-13-13 10:30AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 401) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-26-13 10:05AM in conference room 211.
The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 02-27-13 9:15AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Kahele, Kouchi, L. Thielen, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ruderman ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Keith-Agaran.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 699) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-05-13.

Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Gabbard, Nishihara, Ruderman, Solomon, L. Thielen, Wakai . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Kim). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 111) in amended form (SD 2).
Pass First Reading
Referred to LAB, FIN, referral sheet 30
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Tuesday, 03-12-13 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Hashem, Aquino, Ichiyama, Ing, Takumi, Yamane, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Johanson; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1025) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with Representative(s) Cheape, Fale, Fukumoto, Johanson, McDermott, Ward voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 03-27-13 4:00PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Hashem, Ing, Jordan, Kobayashi, Lowen, Morikawa, Onishi, Takayama, Tokioka, Woodson, Yamashita, Ward; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Johanson, Fukumoto; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Cullen.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1431), recommending passage on Third Reading.

Passed Third Reading with Representative(s) Cheape, Fukumoto, Johanson, Kobayashi, Say, Ward voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Fale, Har, McDermott, Tokioka voting no (4) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 437).
Deferred until 04-09-13.

Senate disagrees with House amendments.
